You want to build software, but don’t want to work for a tech giant?

This website was made for those studying or interested in the technology/digital sector, but don’t know what job they would enjoy.

We understand that there is a plethora of career options in the technology space, too little information and no clarity on where you fit.

We will help point you to the right direction and find something that would suit you.

I’m ready to explore potential tech careers.
